definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.chinese: 我們能借一個衝浪板嗎？

sentences.english: The challenge is to control both kite and board. A kite is unpredictable.
sentences.chinese: 想要同時控制風箏和衝浪板是一件很有挑戰性的事。

sentences.english: Now it’s time to pull out the virtual surfboard and catch the wave.
sentences.chinese: 現在，就是拿出那個虛擬的衝浪板，馭浪前行之時了。

sentences.english: He turned his surfboard out to sea.
I was just about to ask, where is my surfboard?
sentences.chinese: 我才正想問，我的衝浪板呢？

sentences.english: In the beginning, she put Faith on a surfboard to let him feel the movement.
sentences.chinese: 開始時，她把“信念”放在衝浪板上，讓它感覺運動。

sentences.english: What time do we start waxing our boards?
sentences.chinese: 我們什麼時候給衝浪板上蠟？

sentences.english: Surfboards, Stickers, Sandwich Cookies, Concrete Roofing Tiles.
sentences.chinese: 衝浪板，貼紙，三明治餅乾，混凝土屋面瓦。

sentences.english: So you got like a surfboard-shaped board and put wheels on it, so they could ride it.
sentences.chinese: 找一塊衝浪板形狀的板子，加上輪子，就可以滑了。

sentences.english: They cartopped their surfboards to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 他們把衝浪板裝在汽車車篷上面運到了海邊。

sentences.english: The surfboard floats next to them.
They also carry 4) surfboards and have 5)attitudes.
sentences.chinese: 他們也帶著衝浪板，表現出敵視態度。

sentences.english: Launching my surfboard from the beach on Hainan Island, I paddle out to catch a wave.
sentences.chinese: 我在海南島的沙灘上登上衝浪板去斬波劈浪。

sentences.english: Board Sailing is a surf board with a sail.
sentences.chinese: 風浪板就是有帆的衝浪板。

definition: lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
to move/to shift/to move out of the way/to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
